name: 3 in 1 Christmas Fun
description:
This Christmas bring this pack of 3 fun filled christmas games. A perfect simple and cute christmas game gift to give it to your friends, family and well wishers. 

This pack comes with 3 casual games.
* Game 1 : Help Santa catch the Candies, Cakes, IceCreams etc.. without letting them drop.
* Game 2 : Manage Santa free fall along with collecting the eatables. Don't let Santa move up with platforms or completely drop off from platforms.
* Game 3: Tap to make Santa jump onto moving platforms and collect the items on the flow.

Share this game pack with your friends, family and well wishers and make them enjoy this christmas with fun.
